page.title: 01GENERAL REVIEW
page.content: The block contains 4 main settlement areas:parts of Armthorpe,Intake and Cantley,and Cantley village situated on level land below 15m a.m.s.l. { Armthorpe}includes the original village centre,the coalmine and the recent residential growth of the 1970s { Intake & Cantley}are largely council estates built on the edge of Doncaster during the prosperous 1950s & 1960s. { Cantley village}is a small nucleated settlement,still retaining its rural character. The block is a typical{urban fringe with contracting farmland & open space for recreation,public utilities and spoil heaps.Although the pit is the dominant economic activity in the area most residents commute outside the block.
